alert.note: Alert for Hancock; McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 02 at 10:08AM CDT until June 03 at 4:21AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... La Moine River at Colmar affecting Hancock and McDonough Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...La Moine River at Colmar. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Water affects the lowest portions of Lambert Road and affects Lamar Road approximately 100 feet north of the intersection with County Road 26. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 6.6 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
